name: propeller-sdk-v2-examples
description: Examples for using Propeller V2 with different frontend frameworks

scripts.dev:react: npx create-react-app propeller-react-demo --template typescript && cd propeller-react-demo && npm install propeller-sdk-v2
scripts.dev:vue: npx create-vue@latest propeller-vue-demo --typescript --router --pinia && cd propeller-vue-demo && npm install propeller-sdk-v2
scripts.dev:angular: npx @angular/cli new propeller-angular-demo --routing --style=css --skip-git && cd propeller-angular-demo && npm install propeller-sdk-v2 rxjs
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:react && npm run setup:vue && npm run setup:angular
scripts.setup:react: echo 'Copy react-example.tsx to your React project src folder'
scripts.setup:vue: echo 'Copy vue-example.vue to your Vue project src/components folder'
scripts.setup:angular: echo 'Copy angular-example.ts to your Angular project src/app folder'

author: Propeller Team
